Source Emissions | Fugitive - HQ Based on inventory of refrigerators\chillers; for stand-alone commercial units where we had no specifications, it was assumed they had the same charge profile as a comparable known unit. This does not include the 27 kg of estimated R-22 emissions, and 28 kg of actual R-22 emissions (55 kg total) as R-22 is a "non-Kyoto-defined GHG" that "should not be reported" in our inventory, as per TCR guidance of June 15, 2017.

Source Emissions | Mobile Sources > Diesel Light Truck Field fleet of diesel vehicles
Source Emissions | Mobile Sources > Diesel Light Truck > Estimated Estimated diesel use from one field vehicle (371 gal, 5982 mi).
Source Emissions | Mobile Sources > Gasoline Gallons of gasoline for one field vehicle (79 gal, 1607 mi). Field fleet is primarily diesel\biodiesel
Source Emissions | Mobile Sources > Gasoline - Estimated Estimated gasoline for two vehicles without fuel logs.

list1_SourceName.SourceName: Source Emissions | Natural Gas - Fayetteville

Source Emissions | Natural Gas - HQ PG&E metering was faulty for first 11 months of 2016. TCR Help Desk offered CBECS-driven estimations as a non-SEM valid proxy. 2012 CBECS natural gas total intensity is 35.7 cf/sf for Pacific region, and 33.2 for 50,001-100,000 sf. Floor space = 75,000 sf => 26775 ccf using higher non-SEM estimate. (Earlier approach: actual usage for 11/20/16 -12/31/16; 1/1/16 - 8/22/16 use assumed = to 1/1/17 - 8/22/17 gas use; 8/23/16 - 11/19/16 assumed equal to other 2016 ave daily use)

Source Emissions | Natural Gas - IC In 2017, it was revealed by our property manager that meter readings are inaccurate due to improper installation. Further, the meter data they had been providing has no relationship to our gas usage. TCR Help Desk offered CBECS-driven estimations as a non-SEM valid proxy. 2012 CBECS natural gas total intensity is 35.7 cf/sf for Pacific region, and 33.6 for 10,001-25,000 sf. Floor space = 18,000 sf => 6426 ccf using higher non-SEM estimate.
Source Emissions | Natural Gas - Indy
